author: bencomic

panels.narration: * NiMa is listening to youtubed "One Of Us" by ABBA

left.text: I love this song, and often sing it with the gender-specific words flipped around so I don't sound like a transsexual
I hate songs that don't scan if you change references to women to references to men and vice versa, or rhyme etc
staring at the ceiling, wishing (s)he was somewhere else instead... one of us is lonely... ack... ok, I'll stop

title: WORDS CANNOT DESCRIBE THE ELATION I FEEL WHEN PLAYING THIS
